original_text: After he had spent everything, there was no rain in that country. There was almost no food anywhere. So the young man had nothing to eat.
korean_text: 다 없앤 후 그 나라에 크게 흉년이 들어 그가 비로소 궁핍한지라

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 것을 다 쓴 후에

sentences.original_text: there was no rain in that country
There was almost no food anywhere
So the young man had nothing to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 젊은이는 먹을 것이 아무것도 없었습니다
